entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the evening. 60 percent chance of snow overnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 30 April 2023
